product_name: Helly Hansen Welsey Trench Coat - Women's
long_description: Enjoy this Scandinavian take on a women's classic. The detail-rich Helly Hansen Welsey Trench Coat has full-zip, double-breasted snap styling and is waterproof, windproof and breathable. Helly Tech(R) Protection 2-ply laminate construction is fully seam sealed to keep rain and wind out. Durable water repellent finish causes water to bead up and roll off. Quick-drying lining enhances your comfort. Packable hood offers 1-handed adjustment; stormflap covers full-front zipper. Zippered hand pockets; adjustable cuffs and bottom hem seal out weather. The women's Helly Hansen Welsey Trench Coat features a removable belt.
short_description: Enjoy this Scandinavian take on a women's classic. The detail-rich Helly Hansen Welsey Trench Coat has full-zip, double-breasted snap styling and is waterproof, windproof and breathable.
